game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a journey to find the legendary lost treasure. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and overcome obstacles to reach the final destination and claim the riches that await.
game.reward: A chest full of gold and jewels

task.objective: Search for clues at the old ruins
task.description: Explore the ancient ruins nestled deep in the jungle. Search for hidden artifacts and decipher the clues left by previous adventurers.
Battle the fearsome guardian serpent who protects the entrance to the treasure chamber. Use strategy and your wits to overcome this formidable foe.

task.objective: Unlock the secret door with the ancient key
task.description: Find the ancient key hidden in a hidden compartment. Use it to unlock the secret door that leads to the heart of the treasure chamber.
Marvel at the sight of countless gold and jewels as you finally reach the hidden treasure. Collect as much as you can carry!
